short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix unavailable Tweets and make them spicy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your Twitter feed with Spicy Tweets! Those "unavailable" tweets truly are available. If Twitter labels them unavailable then we all know they are spicy!!!
